short_description.en: $1700 rebate for ENERGY STAR Geothermal Heat Pump at least 14.1 EER.
Rebate of $0.50 per sq ft up to $500 for Attic Insulation. Minimum efficiency is R-38.
Rebate of $1 per sq ft up to $750 for Wall Insulation. Minimum efficiency is R-13.
Rebate of $0.50 per sq ft up to $250 for Floor Insulation Above Crawlspace. Minimum efficiency is R-25.
Rebate of $0.50 per sq ft up to $250 for Basement Sidewall Insulation. Minimum efficiency is R-11.
Rebate of $0.50 per sq ft up to $250 for Rim/Band Joist Insulation. Minimum efficiency is R-13.
50% rebate up to $500 for Air Sealing. Minimum efficiency: 30% ACH Reduction. Blower door test required.
50% rebate up to $300 for Duct Sealing. Efficiency requirements apply. Duct blaster test required.
$500 rebate for an Energy Star rated heat pump water heater.
Rebate up to $550 for Air Source Heat Pumps at least SEER 15, EER 12.5, HSPF 8.5. EPA Energy Star qualified installer: $550, otherwise $450.
Rebate up to $800 for Air Source Heat Pumps at least SEER 16, EER 12.5, HSPF 8.5. EPA Energy Star qualified installer: $800, otherwise $700.
Rebate up to $1050 for Air Source Heat Pumps at least SEER 17, EER 12.5, HSPF 8.6. EPA Energy Star qualified installer: $1050, otherwise $950.
Up to $950 for early retirement of Air Source Heat Pump. At least SEER 15, EER 12.5, and HSPF 8.5, good working condition, and under 12 years old.
Up to $1200 for early retirement of Air Source Heat Pump. At least SEER 16, EER 12.5, and HSPF 8.5, good working condition, and under 12 years old.
Up to $1450 for early retirement of Air Source Heat Pump. At least SEER 17, EER 12.5, and HSPF 8.6, good working condition, and under 12 years old.
$500 rebate for ductless mini split heat pumps at least 20 SEER and 9 HSPF.
Rebate up to $1100 for Air Source Heat Pumps at least SEER 15, EER 12.5, HSPF 8.5. EPA Energy Star qualified installer: $1100, otherwise $1000.
Rebate up to $1600 for Air Source Heat Pumps at least SEER 16, EER 12.5, HSPF 8.5. EPA Energy Star qualified installer: $1600, otherwise $1500.
Rebate up to $2100 for Air Source Heat Pumps at least SEER 17, EER 12.5, HSPF 8.6. EPA Energy Star qualified installer: $2100, otherwise $2000.
$900 rebate for a Ductless Mini Split Heat Pump that is at least 20 SEER and 9 HSPF.
$5,200 rebate for an Energy Star Geothermal Heat Pump that is at least 14 EER.
$800 rebate for an Energy Star rated Heat Pump Water Heater.
Rebate up to $500 for for the purchase and installation of a Level 2 (240 volt) electric vehicle charger.
Income qualified rebate up to $1300 for for the purchase and installation of a Level 2 (240 volt) electric vehicle charger.
Income qualified rebate up to $5,500 for a new EV with an MSRP up to $50,000.
Income qualified rebate up to $3,000 for a used EV with a purchase price up to $50,000.
Rebate up to $200 for insulation and air sealing.
Rebate up to $500 for an Energy Star certified ducted or ductless air source heat pump.
Rebate up to $1000 for a qualifying cold climate air source heat pump.
Rebate up to $200 on an Energy Star certified heat pump water heater.
Rebate up to 40% of the total cost of an air source heat pump and installation, up to $1,500. Efficiency minimums apply.
Rebate up to 40% of the total cost of a cold climate air source heat pump and installation, up to $3,500. Efficiency minimums apply.
Rebate up to 80% of the total cost of a ground source heat pump and installation, up to $3,500. Efficiency minimums apply.
Rebate up to 40% of the total cost of a mini-split heat pump and installation, up to $1,500. Efficiency minimums apply.
Rebate up to 40% of the total cost of a cold climate mini-split heat pump and installation, up to $3,500. Efficiency minimums apply.
Rebate up to 60% of the total cost of a high efficency heat pump water heater and installation, up to $1,000. Efficiency minimums apply.
Rebate up to 60% of the total cost of a smart/connected heat pump water heater and installation, up to $1,750. Efficiency minimums apply.
Level 2 EV Charging Home Wiring rebate, up to 80% of the total cost and up to $1,000 for permitting, materials, installation, and electrical costs.
Vehicle to Building EV Charger rebate up to 80% of the cost and up to $2,000 for equipment, permitting, materials, installation, & electrical costs.
$1.00 per watt ($1000/kW) rebate for rooftop solar up to $4,000. Rebates cannot exceed 80% of the total cost.
Rebate up to 80% of the cost of battery storage, up to $2,750. Home must have a heat pump space heater, heat pump water heater, OR V2B EV charger.
Rebate up to 80% of the cost of battery storage, up to $500 for homes without a heat pump space heater, heat pump water heater, OR V2B EV charger.
Rebate for up to 80% of the total cost of electric service upgrades and up to $2,000.
$300 point-of-sale rebate on the purchase of an e-bike.
$500 point-of-sale rebate on the purchase of an e-cargo bike.
Income-qualified residents can receive a point-of-sale rebate up to $1200 on the purchase of an e-bike.
Income-qualified residents can receive a point-of-sale rebate up to $1400 on the purchase of an e-cargo bike.
Persons with disabilities who are unable to use a standard e-bike may be eligible for a point-of-sale rebate up to $1,400 on an adaptive e-bike.
Up to $500 per customer off air source heat pumps. Efficiency minimums apply.
Up to $500 per customer off ground source heat pumps. Efficiency minimums apply.
Ductless mini-split $250/head (max $500 for gas heated home, $750 for electric heated home).

$500 off a heat pump water heater UEF 3.0. Max rebate for water heater incentives: $1000 per home.
$35 off smart thermostats. Max rebate: $70 per home.

Tiered air sealing rebate (see link) ranging from $310 to $770 based on reduction of air loss.

$120 rebate for Energy Star Certified vent-less hybrid clothes dryers. $60 rebate for all other Energy Star Certified clothes dryers.
$350 rebate for Energy Star rated gas-to-induction cooktop and range replacements. $100 rebate for electric-to-induction replacements.
$350 rebate for Energy Star rated air source heat pump water heaters that are at least 30 gallons.
$25 rebate or $50 if on the EEA Time of Use Rate per smart thermostat. Limit two thermostats per EEA member or 5 line voltage smart thermostats.
Rebate of 25% of the purchase price (up to $150) for a corded or battery powered walk-behind Lawn Mower.
Rebate of 25% of the purchase price (up to $250) off a corded or battery powered 2 stage Snow Blower.
Rebate for 25% of the purchase price of an electric or battery powered riding lawn mower, up to $1000.
Rebate for 25% of the purchase price (up to $50) for corded or battery powered leaf blowers, trimmers, pruners, power washers.
Rebate for 25% of the purchase price (up to $100) for a corded or battery powered chain saw.
50%  rebate for extra batteries (up to $25). Must be purchased at time of original equipment purchase. One additional battery per product limit.
Level 2 EV Chargers. Rebate for 50% of total equipment & electric service installation costs up to $1000 or $1500 for EEA Time of Use Rate Members.
$675 rebate per standard ASHP with HSPF at most 2 ton capacity, $1,800 per systems over 2 ton capacity. Not to exceed 50% of equipment cost.
$1,000 rebate per Cold Climate Certified ASHP w/ HSPF, at most 2 ton capacity. $2,400 per system over 2 ton capacity. Capped at 50% of equipment cost.
25% off the price of an E-Bike up to $150. Retrofit Kits do not qualify for Rebate.
Weatherization is free for qualifying low-income households. Includes a professional home audit to determine necessary energy-conserving updates.
$200 per kW rebate up to $1,000 for a solar PV installation.
Rebate of $100 per kilowatt-hour of usable battery system energy capacity (up to $1500) for new battery storage system installations.
$30 rebate for new ENERGY STAR rated electric clothes dryer.
$90 rebate for new ENERGY STAR electric hybrid heat pump clothes dryer.
$100 rebate per unit for electric-to-induction replacements.

50% of the total cost of installation and equipment, up to $1250 for residential EV chargers.
$50 rebate for Electric Resistance Water Heaters in new construction.

$2300 rebate for standard Air Source Heat Pumps over 2 tons (not to exceed 50% of equipment cost).

25% of the cost of the e-lawn care product, with a per-member maximum of $300 across products.

Up to $500 rebate for the independent purchase of a Level 2 charger and its installation.
Up to $90 for ENERGY STAR clothes dryers.
Up to $350 per unit for induction cooktops measuring 30" or larger. New appliances only.
Up to $50 rebate for WiFi-enabled Thermostat (for full amount, must be installed in a managed program).
$100 rebate for Whole House Fan. Attic ventilation systems do not qualify. Limit 2 per member account.

$350 for ENERGY STAR-rated air source heat pump water heaters with 30 gallon minimum.
